text: Noam Murro (born 16 August 1961) is an Israeli movie director and producer. He was born in Jerusalem. He is best known for directing the movies Smart People (2008) and 300: Rise of an Empire (2014). He also directed the 2018 miniseries Watership Down. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli movie directors Category:Israeli movie producers Category:People from Jerusalem
title: Noam Murro
